original_text: This good work that you are doing is helping God's people. It is helping to supply what they need. And it is not only doing that. It is also causing many people to thank God very much.
korean_text: 이 봉사의 직무가 성도들의 부족한 것을 보충할 뿐 아니라 사람들이 하나님께 드리는 많은 감사로 말미암아 넘쳤느니라

sentences.original_text: This good work that you are doing
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 하고 있는 이 선한 일은

sentences.original_text: It is helping to supply what they need
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 필요한 것을 공급하는 데 도움이 됩니다

sentences.original_text: And it is not only doing that
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 단지 그렇게만 하는 것이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: It is also causing many people
